name: Lain
content: Qubit, Grandpa left you a new task before he went to town.

name: Qubit
content: Please don’t tell me it’s more plowing...

name: Lain
content: Not quite. The fields in front of me still need to be planted, but Grandpa said you have to do it *without walking* this time.

name: Qubit
content: Without walking? How am I supposed to reach them then?

name: Lain
content: By using your code, of course! Grandpa wants you to rely completely on your programming skills to handle those fields.

name: Qubit
content: Heh, figures. Guess it’s time to let my code do the farming for me.
